```{python}
import requests

index_buffer = open("main.html", "rb")

res = requests.put(f"https://{NADA_ENV}/quarto/update/{QUARTO_ID}",
                  headers={"Authorization": f"Bearer {QUARTO_TOKEN}"},
                  files={"file": index_buffer})

res.raise_for_status()

index_buffer.close()

```
